scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist backend/dist node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
